title: "Yellow Red Hearts" Looking For Solid Plat+ ADC
body:
"Yellow Red Hearts" (YrHS) is welcoming players of high Elo to join our competitive team.  We are an established team competing at Plat-Diamond tier looking to recruit a skilled ADC that is willing to fill.  The applicant must be active and able to participate in week day practices from 6-12 pm. EST and attended all necessary games.  Initial, privatized tryouts will be held to test and evaluate each candidate individually and accordingly. You're ELO will not decide your admittance, but rather how you play.  We'd prefer applicants to be of plat+, however players of all Elos will be considered if required attributes are met.

**We are looking for:**
     
**ADC:**

The ADC must have high map awareness, remain constantly aware of his/her surrounding scenarios and provide the support with semi-major wards. The ADC must be able to successfully last hit a minimum of 87% overall CS and must be willing to contribute to the shotcaller's judgment calls.  

*The ADC must display:*

* Mastered champion mechanics 
* Advanced knowledge of general game play, particularly his/her opponents
* Positive Attitude 
* Humbleness 
*  Exceptional Leadership Qualities
* Ability to play in a logical manner
* Ability to cope with high pressure situations
